title: Louise Haigh – 2021 Comments on Tightening of Travel Restrictions
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Louise Haigh, the Shadow Transport Secretary, on 16 December 2021.
content:
This decision will cause huge uncertainty for passengers, businesses and the travel sector alike.
